INSERT INTO erp.ware_grouping (ware_id,ware_category_id) VALUES (#wareId#, #categoryId#)
SELECT currval('erp.ware_grouping_id_seq')
sqlMap.select: SELECT w.id,w.name,w.cost,w.default_price AS defaultPrice,w.barcode,w.number FROM erp.ware AS w LEFT JOIN erp.ware_grouping AS g ON (w.id=g.ware_id) WHERE g.ware_category_id=#id# ORDER BY w.id
